bibl.title: Michigan Papyri. Volume II. Papyri from Tebtunis. Part I.

series.title: University of Michigan Studies. Humanistic Series.

bibl.seg: Boak A.E.R., Michigan Papyri. Volume II. Papyri from Tebtunis. Part I. (University of Michigan Studies. Humanistic Series. XXVIII.)
Ann Arbor, 1933, 8°, xvi-259 pp. et 4 pll.

C.R. par Harold I. Bell, CR 48 (1934) pp. 149-150. - E. Berneker, Gnomon 12 (1936) pp. 59-60. - A.S. Hunt, JEA 20 (1934) pp. 124-125. - A.Ch. Johnson, AHR 40 (1934-1935) pp. 480-483. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 9 (1934) No. 17, pp. 133-135. - F.E. Robbins, Michigan Alumnus Quarterly Review, March 1934, pp. 92-93. - T.C. Skeat, JRS 24 (1934) pp. 64-67. - Ulrich Wilcken, ArchPF 11 (1935) pp. 124-125.
